__e: You might not know it, Man of the Earth but the love you feel for your wife is eternal and beautiful.
¤ But my mother was taken to the Eternal... ¤ and I had to leave to find work.
You tell her that your love for her is timeless, and that you would be honored to have her hand in marriage.
Tell your Heavenly Father you didn't find me.
You will not believe how long a minute can feel.
This is the life source and eternal dream mankind has been searching for.
My mother would like to see her daughter's final resting place.
Okay, so maybe love is a little more eternal... than I gave it credit for.
Your eternal sense of hope Your fear of yourself
